Elements.Body: You know, I had a thought. You said the Nightmare thing that came out of me had arms and legs like a kid, right? Did you get a chance to see exactly what it looked like?
We were a little focused on killing it to be honest.
No, actually, it was over pretty quick. The first one we fought had the body of a guy, if that helps.

It’s just that I’m still thinking about that the kid I saw disappear that day of the blackout. He couldn’t have just disappeared, you know? Like, what was he, eaten? Do these Nightmares take shits? Are we gonna find him shat out somewhere?

It’s just that I’m still thinking about that the kid I saw disappear that day of the blackout. He couldn’t have just disappeared, you know? Like, what was he, eaten? Do these Nightmares take shits? Are we gonna find him shat out somewhere?
We aren’t gonna find him anywhere, the kid’s gone, man.
I honestly can’t say. Something else we have to ask Amaia, I guess.

Some of this shit we gotta do ourselves. Next time you and Lawrence fuck with the Nightmares, do me a favor, keep an eye out.  Like don’t fuck yourselves up over it, just check them out a bit, you feel? Cuz maybe these kids aren’t actually lost to us.

Some of this shit we gotta do ourselves. Next time you and Lawrence fuck with the Nightmares, do me a favor, keep an eye out.  Like don’t fuck yourselves up over it, just check them out a bit, you feel? Cuz maybe these kids aren’t actually lost to us.
I’d like to believe that, too.
I haven’t thought about it that way. I’ll make sure to pay attention.
